@@ -2,9 +2,12 @@
 
 let a = "Olá"
 let b = "Mundo"
 
+// Using the concat() method
 let d = a.concat(" ", b);
+
+// Using template literals
 let c = `${a} ${b}`;
 
 console.log(c);
 console.log(d);
